Package wellen.extra.daisysp

Class Oscillator

  • java.lang.Object
    • wellen.extra.daisysp.Oscillator
  • public class Oscillator
extends java.lang.Object
    Synthesis of several waveforms, including polyBLEP bandlimited waveforms.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Oscillator.WAVE_FORM
      Choices for output waveforms, POLYBLEP are appropriately labeled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Oscillator()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Init​(float sample_rate)
      Initializes the Oscillator
      boolean IsEOC()
      Returns true if cycle is at end of rise.
      boolean IsEOR()
      Returns true if cycle is at end of rise.
      boolean IsFalling()
      Returns true if cycle falling.
      boolean IsRising()
      Returns true if cycle rising.
      float output()  
      float Process()
      Processes the waveform to be generated, returning one sample.
      void SetAmp​(float a)
      Sets the amplitude of the waveform.
      void SetFreq​(float f)
      Changes the frequency of the Oscillator, and recalculates phase increment.
      void SetWaveform​(Oscillator.WAVE_FORM wf)
      Sets the waveform to be synthesized by the Process() function.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Oscillator

        public Oscillator()

    • Method Detail

      • Init

        public void Init​(float sample_rate)
        Initializes the Oscillator

        \param sample_rate - sample rate of the audio engine being run, and the frequency that the Process function will be called.

        Defaults: - freq_ = 100 Hz - amp_ = 0.5 - waveform_ = sine wave.

      • SetFreq

        public void SetFreq​(float f)
        Changes the frequency of the Oscillator, and recalculates phase increment.

      • SetAmp

        public void SetAmp​(float a)
        Sets the amplitude of the waveform.

      • SetWaveform

        public void SetWaveform​(Oscillator.WAVE_FORM wf)
        Sets the waveform to be synthesized by the Process() function.

      • IsEOR

        public boolean IsEOR()
        Returns true if cycle is at end of rise. Set during call to Process.

      • IsEOC

        public boolean IsEOC()
        Returns true if cycle is at end of rise. Set during call to Process.

      • IsRising

        public boolean IsRising()
        Returns true if cycle rising.

      • IsFalling

        public boolean IsFalling()
        Returns true if cycle falling.

      • Process

        public float Process()
        Processes the waveform to be generated, returning one sample. This should be called once per sample period.

      • output

        public float output()
